member.name: T:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.Support
member.summary: Support functions for the Buffer.

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.Support.IsBefore(OpenMI.Standard.ITime,OpenMI.Standard.ITime)
member.summary: return true if ta is before tb (eveluates (ta less than tb)
member.returns: true if ta is before tb (eveluates (ta less than tb)

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.Support.GetVal(OpenMI.Standard.IValueSet,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: GetVal will get the index´th number of the axisNumber´th component of the ValueSet.
member.param: ValueSet to read the value from.
Index of the value in the ValueSet.
Relevant for VectorSets only. 1: x, 2: y, 3: z.
member.returns: The index´th number of the axisNumber´th component

member.name: T:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer
member.summary: The SmartBuffer class provides bufferig functionality that will store values needed for a particular link in memory and functionality that will interpolate, extrapolate and aggregate values from these values.

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.#ctor
member.summary: Short description of the SmartBuffer
member.remarks:
The content of the SmartBuffer is lists of corresponding times and ValueSets, where times can be TimeStamps or TimeSpans and the ValueSets can be ScalarSets or VectorSets. Or in other words the content of the SmartBuffer is corresponding ScalarSets and TimeStamps, or ScalarSets and TimeSpans, or VectorSets and TimeStamps, or VectorSets and TimeSpans.
SmartBuffer objects may not contain mixtures of TimeSpans and TimeStamps and may not contain mixtures of ScalarSets and VectorSets. The number of Times (TimeSpans or TimeStamps) must equal the number of ValueSets ( ScalarSets or VectorSets) in the SmartBuffer.

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.#ctor(Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer)
member.summary: Create a new SmartBuffer with values and times copied from another SmartBuffer

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.AddValues(OpenMI.Standard.ITime,OpenMI.Standard.IValueSet)
member.summary: Add corresponding values for time and values to the SmartBuffer.
member.remarks: The AddValues method will internally make a copy of the added times and values. The reason for doing this is that the times and values arguments are references, and the correspondign values could be changed by the owner of the classes

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.GetTimeAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the timeStep´th ITime.

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.GetValuesAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the timeStep´th IValueSet

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.GetValues(OpenMI.Standard.ITime)
member.summary: Returns the ValueSet that corresponds to requestTime. The ValueSet may be found by interpolation, extrapolation and/or aggregation.
member.param: time for which the value is requested

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.MapFromTimeSpansToTimeSpan(OpenMI.Standard.ITimeSpan)
member.summary: A ValueSet corresponding to a TimeSpan is calculated using interpolation or extrapolation in corresponding lists of ValueSets and TimeSpans.
member.param: Time for which the ValueSet is requested

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.MapFromTimeStampsToTimeSpan(OpenMI.Standard.ITimeSpan)
member.summary: A ValueSet corresponding to a TimeSpan is calculated using interpolation or extrapolation in corresponding lists of ValueSets and TimeStamps.
member.param: Time for which the ValueSet is requested

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.MakeCopyOfValues
member.summary: Makes a copy of the first ValueSet in the list of valueSets

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.MapFromTimeStampsToTimeStamp(OpenMI.Standard.ITimeStamp)
member.summary: A ValueSet corresponding to a TimeStamp is calculated using interpolation or extrapolation in corresponding lists of ValueSets and TimeStamps.
member.param: TimeStamp for which the values are requested
member.returns: ValueSet that corresponds to the requested time stamp

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.MapFromTimeSpansToTimeStamp(OpenMI.Standard.ITimeStamp)
member.summary: A ValueSet corresponding to a TimeSpan is calculated using interpolation or extrapolation in corresponding lists of ValueSets and TimeSpans.
member.param: Time for which the ValueSet is requested

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.CheckBuffer
member.summary: Checks weather the contents of the buffer is valid.

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.CheckTime(OpenMI.Standard.ITime)
member.summary: Validates a given time. The check made is for TimeSpan the starting time must be smaller than the end time. Throws exception if the time is not valid.

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.ClearAfter(OpenMI.Standard.ITime)
member.summary: Clear all times and values in the buffer at or later than the specified time If the specified time is type ITimeSpan the Start time is used.

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.ClearBefore(OpenMI.Standard.ITimeStamp)
member.summary: Clear all records in the buffer assocaited to time that is earlier that the time specified in the argument list. However, one record associated to time before the time in the argument list is left in the buffer. The criteria when comparing TimeSpans is that they may not overlap in order to be regarded as before each other. (see also Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.Support.IsBefore(ITime ta, ITime tb)
member.param: time before which the records are removed

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.Clear(OpenMI.Standard.ITimeSpan)
member.summary: Clears the buffer between start- and end- time of the time (TimeSpan).

member.name: P:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.RelaxationFactor
member.summary: RelaxationFactor. The relaxation factor must be in the interval [0; 1]. The relaxation parameter is used when doing extrapolation. A value of 1 results in nearest extrapolation whereas a value 0 results in linear extrapolation.

member.name: P:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.TimesCount
member.summary: Number of time streps in the buffer.

member.name: P:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.ValuesCount
member.summary: Read only property for the number of values in each of the valuesets contained in the buffer.

member.name: P:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.Buffer.SmartBuffer.DoExtendedDataVerification
member.summary: Read/Write property flag that indicates wheather or not to perform extended data checking.
